Text.Page:
We need to secure both ends of Feral Valley, so I'm sending you.

Hunt down {@LinkCreature:41#1001#valley hunter arachnens}, {@LinkCreature:41#1002#noralk kamaras}, and {@LinkCreature:41#1003#sable sabertooths} at both approaches to Feral Valley.

Report to Jeulile at Feral Valley Station when your mission's complete.
With fighters like you around, this place is getting considerably less dangerous.

The federation is willing to reward the elimination of {@LinkCreature:41#1001#valley hunter arachnens}, {@LinkCreature:41#1002#noralk kamaras}, and {@LinkCreature:41#1003#sable sabertooths} at both ends of Feral Valley. Bring back proof of their deaths, of course.
